rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a reception area, following Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
Integrated kitchen and living space designed to foster interaction among joint family members. Uses natural lighting from large windows on the south facade as per Vastu principles.
Dedicated area with acoustic treatments for a home theater experience, positioned away from noisy areas and following Vastu to ensure good energy flow.

A cozy studio apartment section on the ground floor designed as one of the duplex sections. Includes minimalistic furnishings adhering to Brutalist aesthetic with concrete finishes and raw material textures.
Small dedicated space for study or storage, ensuring functionality in joint family living arrangements.

openings.materials: Reinforced concrete frame with glass panel accents
openings.description: Aligns with Vastu principles by allowing positive energy to flow into the home.
Provides natural light and ventilation, adhering to Brutalist design with minimalistic detailing.
Seamless transition between living areas and home theater space while maintaining acoustics.

level_info.layout: Duplex Studio Cottage on a 30x40 plot, featuring distinct zones for joint family dynamics. The ground floor houses main living spaces including an open-plan kitchen/living area, a dedicated home theater, a bedroom studio, and functional auxiliary spaces. Brutalist design elements such as raw concrete, exposed structural components, and geometric forms are incorporated.

rooms.description: The second duplex studio space on the first floor offers privacy and quietude with a similar Brutalist aesthetic featuring exposed concrete elements.
A versatile area designed for joint family activities, such as dining or informal gatherings. Incorporates Vastu recommendations to promote social interactions.

openings.description: Ensures safe movement between floors, designed in alignment with structural integrity requirements.
Provides sufficient natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.

level_info.layout: The first floor houses the secondary duplex studio for additional privacy. It also includes a multi-functional family/common area conducive to joint living, integrating Vastu principles for balanced energy flow throughout the home.

data.building_norms: This design incorporates local building norms and basic Vastu guidelines as applicable. Structural aspects should be verified with licensed professionals.
